text: Mani verim, mbe mba khergi gavar mani farve khɨngi, mba gav khaŋ nzuai, “Nza kha Zisas farasegi 12 thɨgi ŋaara gumgi gum nza khaŋ Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi gari gumgir pani, nza kha gava khergiap nde ndi mbai. Nde nza phorgap Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi, nde mba harigi ŋgui Antiok ŋgu bakɨmen ki, za mba Siria fhaiŋ gum Sirisia fhain ki. Nza raara vhuun nde ndɨɨi.
